review: Overall: The device serves its purpose, is cheaper or on the same price point with competing devices, and it was the only one that I knew for sure would play the Instant/ Prime streaming content.Pros: Easily hidden behind a wall mounted TV  Enables you to watch a variety of TV and movies without a cable subscription  Installation is easy, as in it's easy to figure out which pieces should connect where, but I had a hard time getting the plugs to actually go into my TV's HDMI port. Since this could be an issue with my TV and not the device, I'm not considering it a "con"Cons: Some streaming apps are constantly stalling or buffering, the Hulu Plus app is especially prone to freezing the picture while the sound continues to play  1-Click checkout is mandatory. Therefore, my dog was able to download an episode of a TV show that I had never heard of, and had no interest in watching. I'm out $3 and stuck with a show I don't even want. I wish I was making that up, but in the 2 minutes she was left unattended, she got the remote and chewed it in just the right places to order a show. If a dog can do that, imagine what a child could do.  Somewhat related to the above point, there is no power off option. There is "Sleep" and "Restart" but that's about it. So if you want to power it off, you'll have to reach behind your TV and unplug it.
